Song.title: When You Move
Song.copyright: Words & Music by Steve and Vikki Cook (C) 2011 Sovereign Grace Worship

Arrangement.text:
VERSE 1: Father, [D/A]come reveal the [A]love That You’ve [D/A]freely given [A]us Poured from [F#m]Calv’ry [D]like a [A]flood We [E]look to [F#m D A]You Spirit, [D/A]move and shine Your [A]light Change our [D/A]hearts and fill our [A]minds With the [F#m]radian[D]ce of [A]Christ We [E]look to [F#m D A]You, [ ]We [E]look to [F#m D A]You
CHORUS: For when You [F#m7]move our lives are [Dmaj7]changed We know a t[A]aste of heaven h[E]ere We’re crying [F#m7]out for more of Y[Dmaj7]ou Lord, come and m[A E | D/A | A | D/A | A]ove
VERSE 2: Father, [D]You know all our [A]needs Long bef[D]ore we even [A]speak But Your [F#m]heart is [D]what we [A]seek We [E]look to [F#m D A]You Jesus, [D]come and build Your [A]church Let Your [D]gospel fill the [A]earth ‘Til the [F#m]day that [D]You re[A]turn We [E]look to [F#m D A]You, [ ]We [E]look to Y[F#m D A]ou
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 father come reveal the love that youve freely given us poured from calvry like a flood we look to you spirit move and shine your light change our hearts and fill our minds with the radiance of christ we look to you we look to you chorus for when you move our lives are changed we know a taste of heaven here were crying out for more of you lord come and move verse 2 father you know all our needs long before we even speak but your heart is what we seek we look to you jesus come and build your church let your gospel fill the earth til the day that you return we look to you we look to you
